overview: Bucolic, delicate and sensitive, the short film Poética de Barro, animated in stop motion with clays from the Valley of the Widows of Live Husbands (Jequitinhonha), based on the work of ceramists from Minas Gerais and with an original track composed of ceramic instruments, depicts the saga of a small creature, which needs to survive the vicissitudes of life. If all barriers will be overcome, just watch to find out.
title: Poetic of Clay
